templates.name: Website Waitlist Signup
templates.description: This is a welcome email to the platform
templates.subject: You’re on the waitlist! 🎉
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hey {{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Thank you for joining the Airley waitlist! 🎉 We’re excited to have you on board as we make creating cohort-based courses easier than ever!
­

Airley brings everything you need to create and manage cohorts into one platform—planning, structuring, payments, community and more—guided by built-in AI at every step.
­

We’d love to hear your questions or ideas! In the meantime, join the Airley community for exciting updates, tips, and all things product-related!
­

Cheers,

The Airley Team

Airley

WeWork DLF Forum, Cybercity, Phase III

templates.name: Welcome Email
templates.subject: Welcome to {{ cohort_name }}! 🌟
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Welcome to {{ cohort_name }}! 🎉 I’m thrilled to have you as part of this cohort and can’t wait to see the progress you make.
­

Your First Step:
­

Complete the Onboarding Checklist
­

From customizing your cohort details to creating your first module, this checklist will walk you through each step to ensure you’re ready to launch 🚀
­
Start Your Onboarding
­

Once you’re done, you'll be ready to start building modules, adding resources, creating events, accepting payments, interacting with your students—all from one place.
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

Airley

templates.name: Host Invited For Event
templates.subject: You’ve Been Invited as a Host for {{ event_name }}! 🎉
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Exciting news! You’ve been added as the host for {{ event_name }} scheduled for {{ date_time }}.
­

Here are the event details:
­

Event Name: {{ event_name }}
Date & Time: {{ date_time }}
Cohort: {{ cohort_name }}

Location: {{ event_location_link }}
­

The event is now visible in your Calendar, making it easy for you to stay on top of everything.
­
Check Your Calendar
­

As the host, you’re in charge of leading the session and engaging with attendees. Feel free to prepare ahead and ensure everything is ready for an amazing event.
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

Airley

­

{{ student_name }} has submitted their assignment for {{ assignment_name }}!
­

Here’s a quick summary:
­

Student: {{ student_name }}
Assignment: {{ assignment_name }}
Date Submitted: {{ submission_date }}

Cohort: {{ cohort_name }}
­

Take a moment to review their submission and share any thoughts or feedback.
­

templates.name: Module Deleted
templates.subject: Your Module Has Been Deleted
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Your module 'module_name' has been deleted from your cohort. Here are the module details for your reference:
­

Module Name: [Module Name]
Cohort: {{ cohort_name }}
Date Deleted: {{ deletion_date }}
­

If you need to make any changes or recreate the module, you can do so from your dashboard.
­
View Your Cohort Modules
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

templates.name: Module Created
templates.subject: Your Module {{module_name}} Is Ready! 🎉
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Your module {{ module_name }} is successfully created and will be shown in your Airley calendar
­

Your module is nearly done—here’s what to do next:
­
  • Add Resources: Upload course materials, links, readings, or anything that’ll enrich the learning experience for your students.
  • Create Assignments: You can create assignments to track your students' progress and keep them engaged.
­
Add Resources
­

Modules keep everything organized, with resources and assignments in one place—synced seamlessly with your Airley calendar.
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

templates.name: Course Staff Invite
templates.subject: You’ve Been Invited to Join {{cohort_name}} as Course Staff!
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

You’ve been invited by {{ mentor_name }} to join {{ cohort_name }} as part of the course staff.
­

As a course staff member, you’ll have access to the following permissions to help manage and support the cohort:
­
  • Create events for the cohort and schedule sessions
  • Write messages in the community to engage with students
  • View cohort analytics to track progress and engagement
  • Create modules, add resources, and assignments to the course
  • Review assignment submissions and provide feedback
­

Your role will be essential in ensuring the cohort runs smoothly and students receive the support they need.
­
Accept Invitation
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.
­

Looking forward to having you on board! Cheers to the journey ahead! 🥂

Airley

Date: {{ event_date }}

Make sure to review your event details and prepare as needed. You can check your audio and video settings here to ensure everything’s working smoothly before you enter the event.

templates.name: Payment Setup Confirmation
templates.subject: Payment Setup Complete – You’re Ready to Set Cohort Pricing!
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Great news! Your payment provider has been successfully connected, and you're all set to start receiving payments for your cohort. 🙌
­

Now, you can set your pricing and choose the currency you prefer. Once done, you’ll be able to accept payments from students worldwide—no technical hassle.
­
Set Your Cohort Pricing Now
­

We’re excited to see your course take shape! 🚀
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

Cheers to the journey ahead! 🥂

templates.HtmlFileID:

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Great news—your event is now live and has been successfully added to both your and your students' calendars! 🎉
­

This means your event is now visible in both your and your students' Airley calendars, and automatically synced with Google calendars for easy access. You're all set to engage and interact with your students.
­
Check Your Airley Calendar
­

templates.name: Event Creation Confirmation
templates.subject: Your Event Is Scheduled! 🎉
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Great news—your event has been successfully created and is now in draft mode! 🎉
­

Before publishing, here’s what you can do:
­
  • Review details: Check the event name, date, time, duration, and description.
  • Edit if needed: Update the title, timing, length, or description—or delete the event if needed
­

This event isn’t visible to students yet. Once everything’s set, click Publish to Calendar to add it to their Airley and Google calendars.
­
Finalize and Publish Your Event
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.
­

Cheers to the journey ahead! 🥂

Airley

templates.subject: Your Cohort is Live! 🎉
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

You’ve successfully set up your cohort on Airley and you've laid the foundation for a great learning experience 🎉
­

Now, here's what's next:
­
  • Review and customize your cohort details
  • Start creating your curriculum
  • Create your events
­

You can follow the onboarding guide to walk you through the rest of the setup, ensuring you're all set to launch!
­
Start Your Onboarding
­

Once your cohort is set up, you can onboard students, start engaging with them and guide them through your curriculum.
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.

templates.name: Welcome to Airley! Let’s Get Started!
templates.subject: Welcome to Airley {{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}! Let’s Get Started!
templates.HtmlFileID:
­

Hi,{{ contact.FIRSTNAME }}
­

Welcome to Airley! 🎉 We’re so thrilled to have you on board and ready to simplify your journey as a mentor every step of the way.
­

To get started, here’s your first step:
­

Complete the Onboarding Checklist
­

Setting up your cohort is easy! This checklist guides you from customizing details to creating your first module, getting you launch-ready 🚀
­
Start Your Onboarding
­

Once you’re done, you'll be ready to start building modules, adding resources, creating events, accepting payments, interacting with your students—all from one place.
­
­

Need help? Reply to this email or join our Slack community for real-time support, updates from Airley, and mentor connections.
­

We’re excited to see what you create! 🙌
